contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox automobile | image = Zotye 2008.jpg | name = Zotye 2008 | production = 2006 – present | manufacturer = [[Zotye International|Zotye Auto]] |aka = Zotye 5008<BR>Zotye Hunter (Export)<BR>Zotye Nomad (Export) | class = [[mini SUV]] | assembly = | layout = | predecessor = | successor = | length = 3900mm | wheelbase = 2420mm | weight = 1130kg | related = [[Daihatsu Terios]] | sp = uk }} The '''Zotye 2008''' is a small 5-door [[SUV]] produced by [[Zotye International|Zotye Auto]] in [[Zhejiang]], [[People's Republic of China|China]]. A facelifted version is sold as the '''Zotye 5008''', and is known in export markets as Nomad and Hunter. The car is named in honour of the [[2008 Beijing Olympics]] and also goes by the model project number XS6402.{{citation needed|date=August 2012}} Although it has been alleged that the car is a copy of the [[Daihatsu Terios]] which has been made in China as the [[Huali]] Dario and by the [[Anhui Anchi Motor]] firm, and it has been noted that whilst the front treatment of the grill differs considerably, the rear of the car is nearly identical, the presses for the body panels and associated parts were in fact purchased from [[Daihatsu|Daihatsu Motor Co., Ltd.]], Japan, in 2006 when DMC launched the new generation [[Terios]]. ==Specification== [[File:Zotye 5008 China 2012-04-14.JPG|thumb|left|Zotye 5008]] Engine designs were not purchased from Daihatsu, but uses a range of Mitsubishi-derived fuel-injected 4-cylinder engines dubbed 4G13 and 4G15.<ref>{{cite web|title=Zotye Hunter|url=http://www.zotye.cl/modelos.html|work=Zotye Chile|accessdate=29 August 2012}}</ref> [[File:Zotye nomad side view.jpg|thumb|zotye]] The 2008 is fitted with a 1.3L, producing 65 kW and 115Nm and can reach a top speed of 140kmh.<ref>{{cite web|title=Price and specification|url=http://www.zotye.com/models2008.html?cate=price|work=Zotye 2008 website|accessdate=29 August 2012}}</ref> The 5008 is available with a choice of 4-cylinder 16-valve engines, 1.3L or 1.5L engines, with manual or automatic transmission, CVT on the 1.5L. The 1.3 produces 68 kW and 113Nm, and the 1.5 produces 78 kW and 134Nm, and can reach a top speed of 145kmh.<ref>{{cite web|title=Prices and specification|url=http://www.zotye.com/models5008.html|work=Zotye 5008 website|accessdate=29 August 2012}}</ref> ==Export markets== The car was launched in various overseas markets including South Africa in 2008. Initially sold as the Nomad with 1.3L and 1.5L engines,<ref>{{cite web|title=New Chinese SUV for SA|url=http://www.newstoday.co.za/motoring/motoringnews/3046-new-chinese-suv-for-sa.html|work=News Today|accessdate=29 August 2012}}</ref> it is now sold as the facelifted Hunter and is powered by the same engine as the 1.5L 5008, and is rear-drive only despite its off-roader appearance.<ref>{{cite web|title=Hunter Brochure|url=http://www.zotye.co.za//images/Zotye_Hunter_Brochure.pdf|work=Zotye South Africa}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} * Inside Story – Double Trouble.
